title: Cannot Log In
body:
Hi Guys,

So I logged in around 30 minutes ago, and the play button was grayed out.  I chose to re-login and see if that would make any difference.  

Now when I open the client, it says that it has been reverted to an older version and that it would update (no visual indication that it is doing so).  When I try to login, it says that my password or username combination is incorrect.  I'm sure that it's correct since I was able to login to this website.  I even tried changing my password and try again but it still doesn't work.  

I'm currently uninstalling/reinstalling league.  If this doesn't work, is there a solution to this problem?

Update:  Problem solved, just had to uninstall re-install league.  Hope this works for anyone else having this problem!

Thanks,
